desc: The app in essence would limit screen time exposed to children through computers, phones, and tablets. First we would start with computers and apple products, then androids. (putting it on Xbox or PS4 would be more difficult, so that will be a process in the future).In order to earn screen time, the child or children would need to exercise for it. This can be done either through a goal of steps for a day (e.g. 10,000), or having their heart rate around a level of good exercise (for children this could be anywhere around 150 beats per minute, maybe more) for 30 minutes or more. This would let children feel like they “earned” their playing time. Making them appreciate it more.Because a competitor, unglue inc. already does this, I have to differentiate a bit. The next part of my app would use the hours the child or children have earned for that day, e.g. 10000 steps=2 hours of game time, and use it in easy to understand financial games. There would be different aspects of this game. And the time for screen time would be used as a currency. Depending on how they do on the 5 financial games, they would either gain more screen time or lose it. The idea here is to combine exercise, a sense of "earning" their hours, and basic financial literacy.If you could give me a quote on how much this would cost and the time frame it would take, that would be great.A database would be needed to keep track of the children in each household, who uses what device, how many hours they play, and automate it each week so parent's don't have tofor the financial games part, they need to make it very easy for children to understand. So a stock market game, an investing in commodities game such as good, oil, silver, etc..., a bank loan section where kids can take out time from the bank that they have to pay back with time allotted, and a savings account feature where they can store their unused hours. Also, they earn time from exercise. Either through a certain amount of steps chosen by the parent or through a selected heart rate for 30 minutes.Exercise=time earned for electronic devicesThere would also need to be a feature where parents could schedule homework and dinner time where children cannot access their devices
title: Screen management app

desc: I need an Android app.  I would like it designed and built.  GOLD NAMIBIA / GOLD DINAR / GOLDINARNamibia as has a couples of mines where Gold and Diamonds are extracted. These minerals are sold to the world market.Goldinar buys Gold and Diamonds from the Local mines and sells it to the local market.Local MarketGoldinar buys Gold at discount price and sells it a discount price to the local market.We want a Broker app that we can use to sell gold at a discount price lesser than the stock market, e.g. 30% lesser than stock market price.The value of their shares should be liguidefiable, meaning if you have 10 share that is worth US$ 1000, you can use the value of your shares to trade e.g. buy in shops by swiping using ATM card, send money international, buy online, withdraw at ATM etc.When you swipe, withdraw, buy online or send money international using your Goldinar account, you are disposing off your shares, meaning you are selling your shares on stock market or back to Goldinar.App and WebsiteIs a Broker App, that is owned buy Goldinar and the offering of Goldinar is made available on the app, customer use the app and website to buy and sell their shares buy using their account to trade as explained above.The app should be alive / online and synchronize with the stockmarket of GoldGOLDINAR ATM CARDSGoldinar will issue ATM cards to most of its customers to be used for trading like credit card.Goldinar app/website will have two interface, one for local market that only Namibian can buy shares for a discount price and the other for international market where every share that Namibians dispose of or trade lay available for purchasing by the international market.[Removed by [url removed, login to view] Admin - please see Section 13 of our Terms and Conditions]

desc: This app is a movie player capable of playing a new kind of multi-track content (and currently used for demo’ing the technology).  Essentially the player plays (i.e., moves through) up to 3 movie files simultaneously and synchronized, displaying only the one track then selected by the viewer, and allows the smooth switching of the display to any of the other tracks when selected by the viewer by swiping.  The technology is covered by issued patents (I own).The app was built but: (1) the original programmer joined a start-up and is no longer available—I do own/have the code (Obj-C/XCode); (2) the app stopped working when the latest iOS installed; (3) I need someone new to work with to get me back up and running and for tweaks, improvements and eventually further development; and (4) you have to also help m,e get it onto my iPad in a manner that doesn’t time-out (Testflight seems to time-out after 60-90 days).  For all I know it only needs to be uninstalled and reinstalled or recompiled—but parts may need a rewrite, depending on why it doesn’t work right.To see app working, see [url removed, login to view]  For the original spec, see [url removed, login to view]Right now, the app plays content that is local to the iPad.  Eventually we will look at playing streaming content, so if you have experience with streaming media and/or DRM, please let me know.Bid must include code, all intellectual property rights, and full copyright transfer.  Incorporation of another’s code or module(s) is permitted only if such is done with full royalty-free rights and license to distribute worldwide, and incorporation is fully disclosed.  If you anticipate utilizing another’s code, please disclose in bid.You should indicate both your bid for the current update, and what you will want if and when another update is required due to another ios change.  Any other improvements/modifications to the app feature set will be separately negotiated.  Main concern here and now is keeping the app working.This app implements patented technology.  No patent rights or license is granted except as may be necessary to perform, complete and test the project task.  Any other license must be separately negotiated.
title: Update Multi-Track Video Player fro iPad

title: Mobile development -- 2

desc: We have an Android App which works without internet connection & whenever it gets internet it syncs with cloud server.The issue is, due to this offline,online sync multiple threads are running behind and the app is crashing frequently, within 3 hours it is draining full battery.Also, sometimes the data is not coming from webservices and the sms is not getting sent, it is loading and until you close the app you can not do anything.We have prepared a bug list.We will be using this app for the time being and we will develop this app fresh with new design after 2 months. This partner app talks with customer app. Like UBER driver app & customer app.We also have huge work for customer app, and it will be a long term relation with a high level development team.More information will be sharedWe are only looking for a fixed quote for bug fixing of partner app with fast turn around time - [url removed, login to view]
title: Android App Bug Fixing

desc: I need experienced iOS developer to fix push notifications inside my application.If you can fix notifications, we can agree to long term iOS work.Please bid accordingly
title: iOS Developer

desc: Teslar is a company dedicated to the installation, operation, manteinance of photovoltaic solar plants. We need to create a software that allows our company to obtain data from PV solar plants. We need to obtain data as: solar energy produced, solar energy consumed by the client, energy consumed for the client (house, building, etc), price of the energy and atmospherical parameters (solar radiation, wind speed, index of clarity). The information has to be stored in personal accounts (one per client) and must to be show in mobile App or Web Browser as graphics, projections, etc.We are looking to build something very similar to the next videoExample: [url removed, login to view]Please let me know if someone can to take the challenge. We are an early start-up and we want to take the market with this software.
title: I would like to hire a Software Developer
